channel.title: 4 new sigs *updated again*
channel.description:
well i followed some tutorials and i ended up with this
[img]http://www.freewebs.com/sk8kid27/city%20copy.bmp[/img]
and this although its not exactly as i would have liked it though the tutorial was confusing as hell it did however help me understand how to do some cool effects. I still suck at finding fonts etc.. but i never realy downloaded any new ones so im stuck with like 5 different fonts.
[img]http://www.freewebs.com/sk8kid27/new%20sig%20copy.bmp[/img]
this one is my most recent one... i just finished with it a few minutes ago :) anyways i like the outcome but i think there is to much covering up the render thats the only thing i dislike... i relized towards the end but still i like it. Also i tried a different way with the font and i think it turned out really well.
[img]http://www.freewebs.com/sk8kid27/sig%20copy.bmp[/img]
here is my fourth attempt i like the outcome and everything
[img]http://www.freewebs.com/sk8kid27/halo%20sig.bmp[/img]

item.title: 4 new sigs *updated again*
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:15, topic:132148”]Not only was that thread hijacking, but you lost all respect.
Please, for the love of god, don’t say crap like “omgzor i spent like 2 minz on it jeez”. If so, what is the point of making it at all, and just because you can say it took you no time at all doesn’t fix your mistakes. It just makes me think much less of you.
It sucks just simply because you put ‘no effort’. You should spend time on things, or not bother working on it/showing us at all.

And Billy, your stuff seems to be improving. As you noticed, you should really have a focal point to sigs (with nothing obstructing it), which is why your last one looks so great.[/quote]

thanks man im starting to see that as i have made more and more =\

Read full topic

item.title: 4 new sigs *updated again*
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Not only was that thread hijacking, but you lost all respect.
Please, for the love of god, don’t say crap like “omgzor i spent like 2 minz on it jeez”. If so, what is the point of making it at all, and just because you can say it took you no time at all doesn’t fix your mistakes. It just makes me think much less of you.
It sucks just simply because you put ‘no effort’. You should spend time on things, or not bother working on it/showing us at all.

And Billy, your stuff seems to be improving. As you noticed, you should really have a focal point to sigs (with nothing obstructing it), which is why your last one looks so great.

Read full topic

gonna make a sig outta that.
Here it is:

ugly peice of crap, thats all i can say. You made the building yellow, no no…

billy 5/10, and 5/10

I did it in 2 mins lol, not meant to be special. so 5/10 good for a 2 min piece of work.
There yellow cos I remember last time I went to a Filthy City it was yellow with black grime everywhere.
[/quote]
not at you smart one ^_^[/quote]

billy 7/10 for your first,looks nice but killer 0/10 for you,dont do 2minute works and no point in pasting in someone elses topic about it.
